p: There was significant difference across the 11 sub-locations regarding awareness of flood occurrence (χ 2 = 213.524, df = 70, P > 0.0001) with greater proportion of respondents from lowland sub-locations (Lower Kadianga, Upper Kadianga, West Kadianga, West Koguta and Nyong’ong’a) having observed or experienced flooding events over the past 20 years. This finding is consistent with Thodsen et al. ( 2014) who reported an increase in flood levels and frequencies in lowlands in Denmark.
